docs.lead_paragraph: A CHARMING afternoon affair for a small maiden of 10 was a floral birthday party. The invitations were written on cardboard shapes, out and tinted to represent flower pots of the picturesque earthenware sort, and eleven children, six boys and five girls, were invited. The little hostess made the twelfth.

headline.main: A Message to Women; Jolly and Artistic Party That Any Girl Can Give at Home to Entertain Her Friends.
